Title: Missing Subresource Integrity (SRI)
Remediation Summary: Add integrity and crossorigin attributes to script tags

Title: Missing Content Security Policy
Remediation Summary: Add CSP meta tag with restrictive policy

Title: No Dependency Management
Remediation Summary: Create package.json and implement build process

Title: Client-Side File Processing Without Strict Validation
Remediation Summary: Add magic number validation for file type verification

Title: Monolithic File Structure
Remediation Summary: Refactor into separate HTML CSS and JavaScript files

Title: High Code Churn
Remediation Summary: Implement better planning and code review processes
